titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an Georg Henrik von Wright, [25. 12. 1949]
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Original an der Trinity College Library; Kopie im BA. Publiziert (von Wright, S. 61).

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: OC E 601'1 CW OER L 2354 WIEN 19 25 1700
ELT = PROF WRIGHT STRATHAIRD LADY MARGARET RD
ARRIVED VIENNA EXCELLENT HEALTH AND SPIRITS NOTIFY FRIENDS
